mapper.select: SELECT review_c_id, review_parking_code, review_score, review_contents, review_date, review_declaration, c_name FROM review JOIN customer ON review_c_id = c_id WHERE review_parking_code = #{review_parking_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET review_declaration = true WHERE review_c_id = #{review_c_id} AND review_parking_code = #{review_parking_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_c_id, review_parking_code, review_score, review_contents, review_date) VALUES(#{review_c_id}, #{review_parking_code}, #{review_score}, #{review_contents}, now())
